name: aline-transaction-generator
description: Generate realistic bank account transactions for the Aline Financial REST API

scripts.copy-ng-ui: copyfiles -u 4 -f ./src/ui/transaction-generator/dist/transaction-generator/* ./dist/public && echo 'Copied UI to dist/public/ directory...'
scripts.build-ui: cd ./src/ui/transaction-generator && npm run build && cd ../../../ && npm run copy-ng-ui
scripts.prestart: npm run clean && npm run build

author: leandroyabut
